summary: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.
cast: Sylvester Stallone|Amy Brenneman|Viggo Mortensen|Dan Hedaya|Jay O. Sanders|Karen Young|Claire Bloom|Vanessa Bell Calloway|Renoly Santiago|Colin Fox|Danielle Harris|Trina McGee|Marcello Thedford|Sage Stallone|Jo Anderson|Mark Rolston|Rosemary Forsyth|Luoyong Wang|Barry Newman|Stan Shaw|Mark Chadwick|Candace Miller|Lee Oakes|Sakina Jaffrey|Albert Macklin|Tony Munafo|Joseph Ragno|Nestor Serrano|Harold Bradley|Stephen Joseph Scott|John Lees|Robert Sommer|Lenore Lohman|Mark De Alessandro|Lisa McCullough|Penny Crone|Madison Stone|Ed Wheeler|Dan Daily|Stephen James|Isis Mussenden|Rob Cohen|Pina De Rosa|Andrea Girolami|Marshall Dancing Elk Lucas|Steve Marshall|Pamela Perrine|Kai Portman|Dale Resteghini|Joey Sontz|Michael Wehrhahn
title: Daylight (Pánico en el túnel)
